vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
δουλ-όω,
enslave, [Refs 5th c.BC+]:—mostly in passive, to be enslaved, ὑπὸ Πέρσῃσι, ὑπὸ Ἁρπάγου, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; αἱ ψυχαὶ δεδούλωνται [Refs 5th c.BC+]:—middle (with perfect δεδουλῶσθαι [Refs 5th c.BC+], make subject to oneself, enslave, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to enslave, to cause one to become a slave; (passive) to become enslaved; see also G1528
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to enslave, to cause one to become a slave; (passive) to become enslaved; see also G1528
to reduce to servitude, enslave, oppress by retaining in servitude, Acts 7:6; 2Pet. 2:19; metaphorically to render subservient, 1Cor. 9:19; passive to be under restraint, 1Cor. 7:15; to be in bondage, spiritually or morally, Gal. 4:3; Tit. 2:3; to become devoted to the service of, Rom. 6:18, 22*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: esclavizar, hacer (a alguien) esclavo (pasiva: ser un esclavo); (pasiva) estar atado (por votos matrimoniales)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 使成為奴僕, 奴役 (彼後 2:19)
2) 隱喻. 使之像奴隸一樣
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 使成为奴仆, 奴役 (彼后 2:19)
2) 隐喻. 使之像奴隶一样
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: bắt ai làm nô lệ; bắt buộc người làm nô lệ; nô lệ hóa người khác
